title: Player definately hacking what will be done?
body: Played a game with a person called "Urethra Muncher" .... i know right? anyway he was playing Sion jungle and was able to do full 360 degree turns on the spot with his ult I am talking weaving in and out of the jungle looping around a player fully and then hitting them with his ult it was stupidly obvious it was not the normal clunky Sion ultimate that turns like a rock... So whats to be done? i checked his profile all he plays is Sion so he is obviously cheating in every game i would say this person deserves to be IP banned

> I am led to believe that reporting someone ensures you wont be matched with them again. Isn't that the whole point of reporting someone for being an "unskilled player"?

You seem to have a misunderstanding of how reporting works. Reporting in general does nothing to matchmaking meaning you can get matched with people you've reported. As for reporting for "unskilled" it doesn't garentee you wont be matched with the person again, rather it makes them more likely to be matched with people with a slightly lower MMR or who have been reported for unskilled consistently. In fact a person needs to receive multiple "unskilled" reports for it to do anything at all.

Only if he is really hacking
it is not slowed at all from what i saw just smooth consistent motion and able to perform maneuvers it should not normally do

He is probably doing the Sion ulti exploit where if he spams taunt and dance (maybe laugh works too) during it, it will slow down the running process significantly, making it possible to do precise maneuvers which is not a trait intended for that skill.

I am not sure how would Riot find if a player is abusing such exploit, but they will get banned if found guilty, not sure if perma though. So report or support ticket.
